title.en: Omae ni Dake wa Ijiwaru Shitai

altTitles.ja: お前にだけはイジワルしたい
お前にだけはイジワルしたい～冷たい幼なじみの甘い指

altTitles.en: You're the One I Want to Tease - A Cold Childhood Friend's Warm Fingers

description.en:
**Omae ni Dake wa Ijiwaru Shitai** (お前にだけはイジワルしたい～冷たい幼なじみの甘い指; "You're the One I Want to Tease: A Cold Childhood Friend's Warm Fingers")**:** My neighbor Yu is blunt and distant, and although I've been in love with him for ages, he always casually brushes me aside. One day, though, we end up alone in the dark together. As I grab his arm, my heart pounding, he suddenly kisses me...! He says, "You know, you're the only one I tease." ...Yu, that's no fair...!

**Otouto-kei Osananajimi ga Yajuu-ka shimashite** (オトウト系幼なじみが野獣化しまして)

**Kare no Are ga Katakute Komattemasu (Naki)** (カレのアレが硬くて困ってます（泣）; "His You-Know-What Is Way Too Hard!")**:** Mei isn't a big fan of Nanato Kiryuu, the hottest guy in school. Despite his nice guy persona, she's caught him fooling around with several different girls after class! One day, she sees him sleeping in the nurse's office and discovers a huge secret. When she tries to flee in a panic, he admits the real reason behind his actions! He says she can't tell anyone, but... what's a girl to do?!

---
**Official English Translations:** [You're the One I Want to Tease](https://www.ebookrenta.com/renta/sc/frm/item/139114), [His You-Know-What Is Way Too Hard!](https://www.ebookrenta.com/renta/sc/frm/item/140931)
